name: @context-kit/service
description: Python FastAPI service for Context Kit pipeline orchestration

scripts.stop-service: pwsh -Command "Get-Process -Name python,uvicorn -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.Path -like '*context-kit-service*' } | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 500"
scripts.bootstrap: pwsh -Command "if (-not (Get-Command uv -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Write-Host 'Installing uv...'; irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex } else { Write-Host 'uv already installed' }"

author: Luke Adams <Luke.Adams@intel.com>
